testcase.classname: To validate user is able to view the packages and rent the property at given packages
testcase.name: To rent the residential property at the given packages
testcase.system-out: Given User has opened the magic bricks website..............................passed When user hover to the sell module..........................................passed And user clicks on ad packages..............................................passed And user clicks on show me packages.........................................passed When user selects rent function.............................................passed And Scroll down to buy the package..........................................passed And user clicks on Buy Now for gold plus package............................passed Then Add to My orders page should be displayed..............................passed

testcase.classname: To validate user is able to view the packages and rent the property at given packages
testcase.name: Request a callback with all the valid credentials - Example #1.1
testcase.system-out: Given User has opened the magic bricks website..............................passed When user hover to the sell module..........................................passed When User clicks the Ad packages............................................passed And User enters Darshana,7654329010,darshana@gmail.com,Nagpur and I want to ask about ad Packages you can call me at 9:00Am.passed And User clicks the CheckBox................................................passed And User clicks on the request a callback...................................passed Then It should display a thankyou message...................................passed

testcase.classname: To validate user is able to view the packages and rent the property at given packages
testcase.name: Request a callBack with all the empty credentials
testcase.system-out: Given User has opened the magic bricks website..............................passed When user hover to the sell module..........................................passed When user clicks on the ad packages.........................................passed And user fill some of the credentials and some leave blank..................passed And user scroll down the webpage............................................passed And clicks on request a callback............................................passed Then Fields which are empty should display the error message................passed
